name: Shopping Cart Cover (Black Tuxedo) Boutique Cart Cover
description:
Don’t be fooled! Cloth cart and chair covers do far more than soften and stylize your baby’s public perch. They form a protective barrier between your little one and a swarm of germs. Sound overkill? According to researchers, shopping carts have more germs than public restrooms. And you can bet that those restaurant booster seats are teaming with bacteria too. Don’t wait any longer to cut your child’s sick time in half. Our covers fit shopping carts of all sizes, restaurant high chairs, park swings, mall strollers, and more! Made with extra care by a real mom, you’ll find your cover unique, easy-to-use, and well-made. Just throw your cover into the wash after using. Super-soft, extra-stylish, and safe-as-can-be -- we have your baby covered!

Three Little Miracles covers are known for the double padding put in them. As a mom of 3, I make each cover with my kids in mind. All of the other covers out there might have designer fabrics but they don't have the extra padding. We want your child to be comfortable and protected.

Product Features:

~Snack pocket w/ toy loop,Matching pillow, and safety strap included! (look below to see a list of add-on's)
~Filled with extra-thick, hypo-allergenic, machine washable padding 
~Fits all shopping carts, park swings, restaurant high chairs, and mall strollers 
~Extra padding all the way around, not just in the seat area 
~360-degree coverage 
~Elastic edge for easy, one hand application 
~riple-sewn legs holes reinforced with bias tape for extra durability 
~Machine washable and dryer safe (low heat) 
~Not just for babies - usable through age 4!
~Professionally made by a mom

ADD ON EXTRAS: Drawstring Bag $6.00, Side Pockets $5.00 each, Extra Toy Loops 2/$1.00, Minky Underside $17.00, Minky Drawstring Bag $10.00, and Leg Flaps $22.00. Please convo me before checkout to add any of these.

*All covers are custom made so please allow up to 10 business days to make your cover and get it shipped. Most covers ship within 5-7 business days but it can take up to 10 days. I will email you a delivery confirmation number when I ship it. 

PLEASE NOTE IF YOU ARE NEEDING YOUR COVER BY A CERTAIN DATE PLEASE LET ME KNOW AND I WILL DO MY BEST TO ACCOMODATE!

Our business hours are Monday-Friday 8:00-4:00 CST

name: Custom Boutique (Woodland Delight) Shopping Cart Cover
description:
We offer boutique covers made with designer fabric that fit all shopping carts, park swings, restaurant high chairs and mall strollers. They put a protective barrier between your little one and the unknown germs. Keep your baby germ free with one of our covers. 

*My covers are known for the double padding I put in them. As a mom of 3 I make each of my covers with my kids in mind. All of the other covers out there might have designer fabrics but they don't have the extra padding. I want your child to be comfortable and it also puts a padded barrier between your little one and the hard metal buggy incase they were to fall over they wouldn't hit their head on the metal. 

My covers are padded all the way around not just in the seat area. The elastic cover allows for one hand application. 

Features: They all come with extra padding for the most comfortable ride, snack pocket, toy loop, matching pillow, and safety belt.

****YOU CAN ADD A DRAWSTRING BAG FOR $4.00 EXTRA, IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DO THIS PLEASE CONVO ME.

The things that separate my covers from all other covers are: 
1. All covers are machine washable and can be dried on low heat. 

2. The legs holes are sewn 3 times and reinforced with bias tape for extra durability. 

3.My covers are the most padded covers you will ever find and they can be used up to the age of 4.

4. They are made with extra thick non clump hypo allergenic poly batting.

5. All of our covers are made with designer fabric which makes our covers unique.

6.Your cover comes with a matching pillow made with the same designer fabric that your cover is made with.

7. Your cover comes with a safety belt so you don't have to use those disgusting ones that are full of germs that are on the buggys. 

8. With all of the extras that come with my covers you have everything you need to keep your baby germ free! 

9. All covers are custom made to order and are professionally made by a mom of 3!

10. All covers come from a smoke free/pet free home.

Just look at what past customer have to say about my covers.


nfmurray says:
"LOVE LOVE LOVE my new shopping cart cover! The pattern is exactly as pictured. Comes with a cute little pillow and drawstring bag to keep it in. I just received it in the mail today (shipping was fast) and I can't wait to use it! I would highly recommend this seller."

froggieb says:
"I absolutely love the cart covers for babies. It was just as pictured and described. It is perfect for what I was looking for. The free s/h was a bonus. I can't wait to give this as a gift this weekend. I would recommend this shop to everyone."

CHMermaidMama says:
"Let me begin by saying WOW. The shopping cart covers looked adorable online, but they are even better in person. The fabric is gorgeous and the cover is extremely well made. The carrying bag and matching pillow are awesome-I can just throw everything in my car and not worry about the cover getting dirty. FAST shipping- I ordered the cover late afternoon on Monday and I just just received it. I told all my girlfriends about this shop and I will be ordering again when we have another baby :)"


Our business hours are Monday-Friday 8:00-4:00 CST

*****These covers make a great baby shower gift.*******



*****These covers make a great baby shower gift.*******

PLEASE CHECK OUT MY WEBSITE:
WWW.SHOPPINGCARTCOVERS4BABIES.COM
